name: Lovestory of Melancholy (DEMO)
description:
**NOTE: This is a short demo of what will hopefully be a full game!! If you like the idea of a dating sim of a bunch of punk trans girls, consider donating to our Kickstarter! We're starving artists who need it!**

Donations are appreciated here, but are even MORE appreciated on our Kickstarter!!! You can find that at https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/lomphx/lovestory-of-melancholy
